price: 58. Verily, Allâh is the All-Provider, Owner of Power, the Most Strong.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
